verses.name: Deuteronomy 11:9
verses.text: And that ye may prolong your days in the land, which the Lord sware unto your fathers to give unto them and to their seed, a land that floweth with milk and honey.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 11:10
verses.text: For the land, whither thou goest in to possess it, is not as the land of Egypt, from whence ye came out, where thou sowedst thy seed, and wateredst it with thy foot, as a garden of herbs:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 11:11
verses.text: But the land, whither ye go to possess it, is a land of hills and valleys, and drinketh water of the rain of heaven:
